Class 2: Why code?

Jun 6, 2015

The Plan

Discuss: Readings + Links

  • Websites vs. Webapps
  • Any links? Questions?
    • Magic Email

Lecture: What is UI Prototyping in Code?

  • UI vs. UX
  • Prototyping
    • GUI tools: Invision, Maccaw, Sketch, Framer, Oragami
    • Why in code?
  • Look at some sites and interactions:
    • A look at Instacart
    • Checkout processes: Task Rabbit
  • Some real world examples
    • Brad Frost’s Foodbank prototype
    • Bearded’s HTML wires for AAH, see this article.
    • My DiJiFi prototype
    • Onlyinpgh - defunct startup I was in (these were from when gradients were more popular, don’t judge!).
    • Mr. Bottles - from an assignment for a site redesign, focus on content.
    • Flysolo

Final Projects

  • Ambika Roos
  • More soon!

Lecture: Oh, the Internet

  • Not a cloud
    • Submarine cable map
    • Sharks!
  • A silly metaphor
    • Request and response
    • A bunch of words: IP address, DNS, servers, VPS, hosting, domain names
    • Browsers are not all created equal
  • Front-end vs. backend
    • Separations of concerns, front-end review
  • Native apps vs. Webapps

Break

Code: Start Profile Page

  • Review HTML/CSS concepts
    • Cascade, specificity
    • Nesting
    • Semantics
  • Demo normalize
  • Project file structure and stylesheet
    • Naming

Work time and Q/A

For Next Time

Readings:

  • Death to Bullshit - video, Brad Frost
  • Dao of Web Design - from 2000?! This one’s a classic.
  • Mobile First Responsive Web Design - how we approach RWD today.
  • Responsive Strategy - The different options in creating a responsive website.
